GNOME Initial Setup is a tool to set an OEM provisioning mode so that the initial user can set their user details themselves.

sections.title: Configuration
sections.content: First enable GDM. Initial Setup uses GDM to run. Ensure that the system has no user accounts. GDM will detect the absence of users on boot and launch gnome-initial-setup.
